ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin anyways?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve never gotten her to say anything else either. Perhaps good Miss Sylia is running a covert Lute String Armor business on the side? ... I also offer to
ygData.messageBody:
"Catherine M. Campbell" wrote:

> I have a question regarding the quest given by Sylia Windlehands -- how
> many times can you do it? Every time I talk to her (hoping to get another
> quest) she asks me for the spiderling silks. Having done this quest 3 or 4
> times, I can only ask -- how many lutes do they have there that need strings?

I've never gotten her to say anything else either. Perhaps good Miss
Sylia is running a covert Lute String Armor business on the side?

> Are there other quests in Kelethin that a bard can do, aside from offering
> to locate people's corpses for them?

I also offer to escort people to places they don't know how to get to or
to places that would otherwise take hours to get to (thank Erollisi for
Selo's Accelerando!) This frequently includes trips from Kelethin to the
docks, to Freeport, and for some Enchanters - to High Hold.

However, as far as "official" quests go... I have found nary a one
besides the first.


Marianda
Devoted Drummer
